title: Vaagai Haaram with Matching Jhumki - A Timeless Celebration of Tradition
materials: 22K Gold base with intricate CZ (Cubic Zirconia) stone settings
featuring Emeralds (Pachala) and Rubies (Erra Kalla). The set is finished with lustrous
cultured Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and depth.
features: This exquisite Vaagai Haaram showcases the traditional Telugu design with a modern twist. The intricate filigree work on the pendant and Jhumka is inspired by traditional temple architecture. The haaram features a cascading design, punctuated by emerald and ruby accents. The Jhumka earrings mirror the pendant's filigree detail, creating a cohesive and elegant set.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant emerald green and ruby red accents. The white freshwater pearls offer a soft
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning choice for a bride (Vadhuvu) or for attending a grand celebration (Shubhakaryam). Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: This Vaagai Haaram set is a true masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional Telugu design with modern jewelry making techniques. The high-quality CZ stones provide a dazzling sparkle, while the Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting brilliance. The combination of emeralds, rubies, and pearls carries cultural significance and makes this set a timeless heirloom piece.
